name: 冬優子
text: おはようございまーす！
trans: Good morning everyone!

name: 冬優子
text: ……って、誰もいないのね
trans: ...Huh, no one else is here yet.

name: あさひ
text: おはよっす！
trans: Mornin'!

name: 冬優子
text:
わっ！
もう、びっくりした～
trans:
Ack!
Hey now, you shouldn't startle Fuyu like that～

name: あさひ
text: あ、冬優子ちゃん、お疲れっす！
trans: Oh! Hi Fuyuko-chan!

name: 冬優子
text: うん、お疲れ様～
trans: Yes, hello to you too.

name: あさひ
text: じー
trans: *stare*

name: 冬優子
text: ？　どうしたの、あさひちゃん？
trans: Hm? Is something bothering you, Asahi-chan?

name: あさひ
text: それ！
trans: That is!

name: 冬優子
text: それって……？
trans: What is...?

name: あさひ
text: もっと近くで見たいっす～！
trans: I wanna take a closer look!

name: 冬優子
text: え、な、なになに！？
trans: Huh!? A-At what!?

name: 冬優子
text: あ、いや、なんでもないよっ♡
trans: Oh, nothing. ♡

name: 冬優子
text:
これね、友達にもらったんだ！
なんか、アニメのやつみたいで……
trans:
Is this what you're interested in? It was a gift from a friend!
They said it's from some anime...

name: あさひ
text:
へぇ～！
すごそうっすね！　なんか
trans:
Woah～! 
Sounds kinda cool!

name: 冬優子
text:
うん！
えへへ、可愛いよね～
trans:
Uh-huh!
Eheheh, it sure is cute～

name: あさひ
text: どんなアニメなんすか！　もっと知りたいっす！
trans: What kinda anime is it from? I wanna know more!

name: 冬優子
text:
あ、あー……
ふゆはよくわかんないんだけどね……
trans: W-Well... Fuyu doesn't really know anything about it, but...

name: 冬優子
text:
えっと、アイドルの女の子たちが出てくる……
魔法のある世界の物語でね……
trans:
Ummm, it's about these girls who are idols...
And they live in a world with magic...

name: 冬優子
text:
みんな可愛くて……キラキラで……
でも、すっごくかっこいいんだ……
trans:
They're all super cute... And they all shine...
But, they're all really cool too...

name: 冬優子
text:
……って、ふゆは全然わかんなくって、
友達に聞いた話なんだけどね、えへへっ
trans: ...Not that Fuyu knows any of that herself, though. That's just going off what Fuyu's friend told her. Eheheh.

name: あさひ
text:
へぇ～、なんだか今すぐにでも
見たくなったっす！
trans: Woah～, that really makes me wanna watch it! Like right now!

name: 冬優子
trans: ...Huh?

name: あさひ
text:
どんな子たちがでてくるんすか！？
それに、アイドルと魔法がどう関係してくるんすか！？
trans: What sorta girls are in it!? And what does them bein' idols have to do with the magic!?

name: あさひ
text: あとあと──
trans: Also, I wanna kn--

name: 冬優子
text:
い、いっぱい聞かれると
ふゆ、混乱しちゃうよ～
trans: F-Fuyu can't really answer all those questions you have～

name: 冬優子
text: そんな気になるなら……アニメ、見てみたら？
trans: If you're that interested... Why don't you just watch it yourself?

name: あさひ
text: 今日、帰ったら見てみるっす！
trans: I'm going to watch it as soon as I get home!

name: あさひ
text: 全部見尽くすっすよ～！
trans: I'm gonna watch the whole thing!
